title: Visual Studio Tips and Tricks
eventShortDescription: ​A fun fast-paced session about getting the most from the Visual Studio IDE. The Visual Studio development environment is full of new features to make developers more productive. Learn the favorite tips and tricks that our own developers use in Visual Studio. See examples of how third-party products can extend Visual Studio .NET. Learn how to take advantage of the free Web hosting feature. This session is 99.9% demo.
